faqs.question: Should I invest in a fully furnished or a bare-shell commercial shop unit
faqs.answer: The choice depends on your investment strategy. Generally, bare-shell units are slightly cheaper to acquire upfront but require substantial fit-out costs borne by either the owner or the tenant. For high rental yields, pre-leased fully finished units are often preferred.
